name: 3/4" NPT Natural Gas Pressure Regulator Outlet 3" inlet 6" Water Column Range，Commercial Grade Gas Regulator for HVAC, Boilers, Grills and Industrial Applications
short_description: Commercial-Grade Performance: Designed for heavy-duty use, this natural gas pressure regulator is built to handle demanding industrial and commercial applications, including HVAC systems, boilers, and large-scale gas appliances.

Precise Pressure Control: Features a 1/2 PSIG inlet pressure and 3-6 inch WC outlet pressure range, ensuring accurate and consistent gas flow for optimal performance and safety in high-pressure environments.

Applicable to: American Range Bakers Pride Oven Where Applicable. Blodgett Oven Series: 900, 999, 1000, BCG, FA, GZL. Garland Griddle Series: GD. Imperial Oven IR, IHR Keating Fryer BB, CC & TS: 18 & Up. Southbend Oven Series: 300. Griddle Series: SG Counter Top Vulcan Broiler, Grill, Warmer Where Applicable. Fryer 7594G, Oven Series 7000 Range 24L, 36L/LC, 48L/LC, 148L/LC, 60L/LC/LCC, 161L/LC, 260L/LC/LCC.
Easy Installation: Equipped with a 1-inch inlet/outlet opening and 3/4-inch FPT thread, this regulator is compatible with standard gas systems, making installation quick and hassle-free.

Safety & Compliance: Engineered to meet strict safety standards, this regulator ensures reliable gas pressure control, reducing the risk of leaks and ensuring safe operation in high-demand environments.

name: Maxitrol 325-3L-1/2 – 1/2" Line Regulator for 2 PSI Natural Gas or Propane Systems, 10 PSI Inlet Pressure, Horizontal Upright Mounting, Aluminum Construction, Made in USA, 12” x 12” x 6”
short_description: Precise Gas Flow Control: Designed for 2 psi inlet systems, the Maxitrol 325-3L-1/2 maintains consistent outlet pressure for stable operation and reliable performance across multiple gas appliances
Versatile Fuel Compatibility: Works with natural gas, propane, mixed gases, liquefied petroleum gases, and LP gas-air mixtures for flexible installation in homes, RVs, and commercial setups

Rugged Aluminum Construction: Ideal for residential, industrial, and light commercial applications, the corrosion-resistant aluminum construction ensures long-lasting use in indoor or outdoor environments

Easy Installation & Mounting: Features 1/2" NPT connections with a compact 12 x 12 x 6 inch footprint and a lightweight 1 lb design for fast, secure, horizontal upright installation and smooth adjustments

Expertly Crafted in the USA: Proudly manufactured in the United States by Maxitrol—an industry leader known for precision engineering, superior quality, and dependable performance you can trust in every connection
product_description: Product Description Pipe size 1/2", 10 psi Inlet pressure, horizontal upright mounting, Maxtor 325-3L-1/2 1/2" line regulator, aluminum, 2 psi Inlet pressure. Made in United States. Manufactured by Maxtor company. From the Manufacturer *** Precision Crafted for Power & Performance *** Reliable gas control starts here—the Maxitrol 325-3L-1/2 Gas Pressure Regulator ensures precision and steady performance across every connection. Built for accuracy and durability, it delivers the consistent pressure your gas system depends on, keeping every appliance running efficiently and safely. From home heaters to commercial ranges, this regulator protects your equipment and your peace of mind—because true reliability begins with precision craftsmanship. *** Engineered for Steady, Reliable Flow *** Designed for 2 psi inlet systems, this Maxitrol regulator maintains consistent outlet pressure for dependable performance across multiple gas lines. It helps prevent surges and flame instability—protecting your stove, boiler, heater, grill, range, or generator from pressure drops that disrupt efficiency. *** Adjustable Power for Any Setup *** From kitchens to RV setups and camp sites, this regulator adapts easily to your needs. Compatible with natural gas, propane, liquefied petroleum gases, LP gas air mixtures, and mixed gases, it’s ideal for BBQ grills, generators, fireplace use, and more—wherever reliable gas control matters. *** Durability You Can Depend On *** Built from corrosion-resistant aluminum, the 325-3L-1/2 stands up to demanding indoor or outdoor conditions. Designed for residential, industrial, and light commercial use, these high performance, low maintenence regulators offer reliable performance year after year. *** Trusted Maxitrol Performance *** At just 1 lb with a 12 x 12 x 6 inch footprint, it installs fast using 1/2" NPT connections for secure horizontal upright mounting. Backed by over 75 years of expertise and proudly made in the USA, the Maxitrol 325-3L-1/2 delivers craftsmanship, accuracy, and lasting performance—keeping your system safe, stable, and ready to perform when you need it most.

name: 1/2" Natural Gas and Liquefied Interchange Pressure Regulator, Natural Gas Pressure Regulator with 2 Brass 1/2" NPT conversion adapter for NG/LPG Applications
short_description: 【SPECIFICATIONS】The 1/2 PSI gas regulator of the 102-B model fit for natural gas and liquefied gas valves. Both the inlet and outlet of the valve are 1/2" FPT pipe threads. We additionally furnish a brass 1/2" NPT conversion adapter-1/2" NPT male x 3/8" flare male. 1/2" NPT male x 1/2" NPT male. Plus joint thread tape.

【INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE】When the LPG gas regulating valve is used: LP inlet pressure is 2.74Kpa(11"w.c), outlet pressure is 2.45~2.55 kpa(10"w.c), and gas flow rate is 30L/min; when the natural gas regulating valve is used: LP inlet pressure is 1.74Kpa(7"w.c). Outlet pressure is 0.95~1.05 kpa(4"w.c), flow rate: 50L/min

【CONVENIENCE USE】This gas regulator is adjustable, which can be used for natural or propane application, but original setting is LP state. Please unscrew the 20.3mm diameter aluminum knob in the gas valve to switch the direction of the LP/NG copper shaft core. It is more simple, fast, and convenient.

【PERATE TEMPERATURE】32°F-225°F (0°C-107°C). Do not install the regulator too close to the heating equipment or use in very cold environment. Heat or cold can change the resistance of the spring inside the regulator. And the gas pressure regulator will not turn off the flow of gas.
【APPLICATION】This natural gas pressure regulator fit for natural gas grills, heater, oven, gas welding equipment, NG gas and liquefied interchange pressure regulator, etc.

name: 1/2" Gas Pressure Regulator, Natural Gas and Liquefied Interchange Pressure Regulator with 2 Brass 1/2" NPT conversion adapter for NG/LPG Stove, Water Heater, BBQ Grill
short_description: Complete Compatibility with Included Fittings – The 102-B model 1/2 PSI gas regulator works with both natural gas and liquefied propane systems. It features 1/2" FPT connections on both the inlet and outlet. For added convenience, the set includes two solid brass adapters (1/2" NPT male x 3/8" flare male and 1/2" NPT male x 1/2" NPT male), along with a roll of thread seal tape to ensure a leak-proof installation.

Universal 1/2" NPT Inlet & Outlet – Featuring 1/2" NPT female threads on both the inlet and outlet sides, this natural gas regulator is compatible with most gas lines and conversion setups. Ideal for gas regulators in kitchens, garages, or RVs.

Important Note – The operating temperature range for this gas grill regulator is 32°F to 225°F (0°C to 107°C). Do not install the 1/2 PSI gas regulator too close to heat sources or use it in extremely cold environments, as temperature fluctuations may affect the internal spring's performance. Note that the regulator does not shut off gas flow. This valve is well-suited for commercial kitchen appliances.

Adjustable for LP or NG – This natural gas regulator is factory-set for LP (liquefied propane) but can be easily adjusted for natural gas use. Simply unscrew the 20.3mm aluminum knob on the gas valve to switch the direction of the internal copper shaft. The process is quick, straightforward, and convenient.

Safe & Certified Construction - Built from high-strength aluminum alloy and brass fittings for durability, this gas regulator offers corrosion resistance and longevity. Backed by a 12-month replacement guarantee and CSA compliant structure for added peace of mind.

name: Maxitrol RV48L Natural Gas Pressure Regulator, 1" In and Out Opening, 3/4" FPT Thread,1/2 PSIG Inlet Pressure, 3"-6" WC Outlet Pressure
short_description: GAS TYPE & PRESSURE - Gas Type: Natural Gas (NG). Inlet gas pressure: 1/2 PSI. Outlet pressure range: 3" - 6" Water Column
PIPE THREAD SIZE - 3/4" Inlet & 3/4" Outlet FPT GAS PIPE. Make sure you measure the gas pipe or regulator opening as close to 1-1/16 inch as shown in the picture’s table.
CAUTION - This regulator has 1-1/16" openings for 3/4" gas pipes. The 3/4" gas pipe means interior diameter 3/4" but outside diameter is 1-1/16", refer to the pictures before buying.
MARKING - Model: RV48L, Marking: 1/2 PSIG, Po 3" - 6". Inlet pressure 1/2 PSI. Adjustable outlet pressure 3"-6" Water Column.

OPERATE TEMPERATURE - 32°F - 225°F (0°C - 107°C). Do not install the regulator too close to the heating equipment or use in very cold environment. Heat or cold can change the resistance of the spring inside the regulator.
product_description: Maxitrol Pressure Regulator for Natural Gas (NG) Product Description: Brand: Maxitrol Gas type: Natural Gas (NG) Refer to the pictures on how to find the correct pipe thread size. This regulator has 1-1/16" openings for 3/4" gas pipes. 3/4" IN and 3/4" OUT Female Pipe Thread. The 3/4" gas pipe means interior diameter 3/4" but outside diameter is 1-1/16", refer to the pictures before buying. Inlet pressure (CSA rated and Maximum operating): 1/2 PSI (34 mbar). Outlet pressure range: 3” - 6” Water Column Ambient operating temperature range: 32°F - 225°F (0°C - 107°C). Attention: NOTE: GAS PRESSURE REGURATORS WILL NOT TURN OFF THE FLOW OF GAS. The pipe fittings for this regulator are based on NPT pipe threads - dimensions according ANSI/ASME B1.20.1 standards. Install the regulator properly with gas flowing as indicated by the arrow on the casting. *NOTE - Do not install the regulator too close to the heating equipment or use in very cold environment. Heat or cold can change the resistance of the spring inside the regulator. How to find the correct pipe thread size WARNING: The NPT thread size is NOT referring to the size of the thread itself! The plumbing industry standard for the pipe sizes is NOT always as straightforward as measuring the pipe. Measuring the pipe will often mislead you into choosing the wrong pipe size. The "pipe thread size" is measured and based on the inside of the pipe. A lot of people measured the thread / the opening for the thread / outside diameter of the pipe, and thought that was the thread size. It was WRONG. The NPT thread is referring to the Interior Diameter of the pipe.
